name: Clams
startingPosition: Laying on side, knees stacked and bent at a 90 degree angle
description:
1. Engage hip to lift top leg, leg should lift in one motion 
2. Return leg to starting position 
3. Repeat

name: Center Leg Raises
startingPosition: Laying on side, legs straight and stacked on top of each other
description:
1. Engage hip to lift top leg straight upwards 
2. Return leg to starting position 
3. Repeat

name: Front Leg Raises
startingPosition: Laying on side, legs straight, top foot resting on ground in front of bottom foot
description:
1. Engage hip to lift top leg straight upwards; top leg remains in front of bottom leg 
2. Return leg to starting position 
3. Repeat

name: Back Leg Raises
startingPosition: Laying on side, legs straight, top foot resting on ground in back of bottom foot
description:
1. Engage hip to lift top leg straight upwards; top leg remains in back of bottom leg 
2. Return leg to starting position 
3. Repeat

name: Leg Circles
startingPosition: Laying on side, legs straight and stacked on top of each other
description:
1. Engage hip to lift top leg straight upwards 
2. Move foot in circular motion 
3. Continue for time

name: Front-Back Toe Taps
startingPosition: Laying on side, legs straight and stacked on top of each other
description:
1. Engage hip to lift top leg straight upwards (Center Raised position) 
2. Tap top foot in front of bottom foot 
3. Return foot to Center Raised position 
4. Tap top foot behind bottom foot 
5. Return foot to Center Raised position 
6. Repeat

name: Figure Eights
startingPosition: Laying on side, legs straight and stacked on top of each other
description:
1. Engage hip to lift top leg straight upwards 
2. Move foot in figure eight motion 
3. Continue for time

name: Runners
startingPosition: Laying on side, legs straight and stacked on top of each other
description:
1. Bend top knee to 90 degrees while moving top knee so that femur is perpendicular to rest of body 
2. Return to starting position 
3. Repeat

name: Runners with Leg Extension
startingPosition: Laying on side, legs straight and stacked on top of each other
description:
1. Bend top knee to 90 degrees while moving top knee so that femur is perpendicular to rest of body 
2. Kick foot out while bringing leg back to starting position 
3. Repeat

name: Fire Hydrants
startingPosition: Hands under shoulders, knees under hips (Table Top position)
description:
1. Shift weight to one side 
2. Lift non-weight bearing knee out to the side until parallel with ground while maintaining a 90 degree bend in knee 
3. Return knee to ground 
4. Repeat

name: Hurdlers
startingPosition: Hands under shoulders, knees under hips (Table Top position)
description:
1. Shift weight to one side 
2. Lift non-weight bearing knee off ground and straighten leg out backwards 
3. Bend knee and pull forward as if lifting over an object 
4. Straighten leg out backwards 
5. Repeat

name: Donkey Kicks
startingPosition: Hands under shoulders, knees under hips (Table Top position)
description:
1. Shift weight to one side 
2. Lift non-weight bearing knee backwards so foot moves towards sky while maintaining a 90 degree bend in knee 
3. Engage glute muscles to lift foot and knee upwards 
4. Lower leg to ground 
5. Repeat
